call_summary.final_outcome: Receptionist completed an intake for a motor vehicle accident, attempted to consult an attorney while the caller was on hold, and then informed the caller that the firm could not assist due to insurance liability denials, advising the caller to call back if uninsured motorist coverage is identified.

transfer_context.description: The receptionist attempted to consult an attorney regarding the caller's liability questions but returned to the line to provide the firm's decision directly.
